section.heading: Construction of §§ 31-4725 through 31-4730.
section.text: Sections 31-4725 through 31-4730 shall not be construed to invalidate a law permitting the use of a policy form which has been filed for the period required by local legislation governing the forms of policies.

annotations.annotation: as added Mar. 14, 1985, D.C. Law 5-160, § 3(h), 32 DCR 39
